00039 class PWIZ_API_DECL TruncatedLorentzian : public ParametrizedFunction< std::complex<double> >
00040 {

00042 
00043     enum PWIZ_API_DECL ParameterIndex {AlphaR, AlphaI, Tau, F0};
00044 
00045     TruncatedLorentzian(double T); // cutoff value T

00047 
00048     virtual unsigned int parameterCount() const {return 4;}

00052

00054                        double shift = 0, double scale = 1) const;
